name: Musical Maze
summary:
In the “Musical Maze” adventure, you try in a scattered maze to save your notes from the pause signs. Don't let the pause signs silence you.
Solve the maze, accompanied by music from different regions, and continue your way without being caught by the pause signs.
It consists of minimal 3D models made of notes and played with native instruments, inspired by the sounds of the 7 different continents.
Background sounds specially designed for each section. One sound per move, and these captured sounds repeat in a loop, so you play your own composition. Each level is a new composition.
Millions of players mean millions of compositions.
